div.name: derivation-container
div.description: Serves as the main container for the entire derivation. All elements with the class `derivation-some-class` should be nested inside this container, ensuring that it contains all the necessary information related to the derivation.

div.name: single-concepetual-question-container
div.description: Appropriate for containing a single conceptual question including their options.

div.name: summary-container
div.description: Appropriate for the summary section of a webpage.

div.name: concepts-container
div.description: Best used for sections detailing key or fundamental concepts.

h1.name: title-heading
h1.description: Used as the primary heading for any section. This style is ideal for clearly distinguishing the main title of the content.

h2.name: sub-heading
h2.description: Designated for secondary headings within any section. It effectively structures content by grouping related information under a primary heading.

h3.name: minor-heading
h3.description: Best used for tertiary headings under sub-sections, particularly in contexts such as explanations, questions, or key concepts.

ul.name: list-group list-group-flush
ul.description: Removes borders and rounded corners for a clean, edge-to-edge list presentation inside a parent container. Suitable for unordered lists where the sequence of items is not important.

ol.name: list-group list-group-numbered
ol.description: Applies numbering and list-group styling for ordered lists, maintaining edge-to-edge layout. Ideal for lists where the sequence of items matters.

li.name: list-group-item
li.description: Represents an individual item within a list. Used in both ordered and unordered list structures to indicate list elements.

span.name: highlight-text
span.description: Used to emphasize important text elements across different sections, ideal for key terms or highlighted information within general content.

span.name: bold
span.description: Used to emphasize text by bolding it

span.name: ital
span.description: Used to emphasize text by italizing it
